name: 廖天豪
objective:
本課程就電磁波應用在微波遙測領域做介紹，內容包含電磁波散射理論，隨機散射，輻射轉移方程及分層介質，進而延伸到應用層面對雪地，植披，土壤粗糙面及海洋模型的探討。
This course introduces the application of electromagnetic waves in the field of microwave remote sensing. The content includes electromagnetic wave scattering theory, random scattering, radiative transfer equations, and layered media, extending to the application aspects of models for snow, vegetation, soil, and ocean.
schedule:
Week 1~Week4 Scattering and Absorption by a Single Particle (Rayleigh scattering, Born Approximation, Disks and cylinders, Mie scattering)
Week 5~Week8 Fundamentals of Random Scattering (Specific Intensity, Phase Matrix, Passive Remote Sensing)
Week 9 Mid-term
Week 10~Week13 Radiative Transfer Theory (Vector Radiative Transfer Theory, Multiple scattering, Rough surface boundary conditions, Reciprocity)
Week 14~Week17 Rough Surface Scattering g (Small Perturbation method, Perfect Electric Conductor, Dielectric Surfaces)
Week 18 Final
materials: L. Tsang etal, Scattering of Electromagnetic Waves, vols 1, Wiley Interscience 2000
